messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Political Trivia
messages.msgSnippet: ... And don t forget Dubya saying that there is no way the US is going to cut emssions of green-house gases (despite election pledges). His administration is
messages.messageBody:
Lynda wrote:

PART I:  I must have fallen asleep or else we are definately being kept in
the dark
AGAIN!

Am I the only person in the world that didn't know the Repub controlled
congress voted a pay raise for the prez???  A HUNDRED PERCENT INCREASE!!!!

That is absolutely ludicrous!!!!!!!!!!!!  Let's see, rent free, meals free,
transportation free, utilities free, staff free, office free, supplies free
AND they get the same amount when they leave office only loosing the free
rent, utilities, meals and transportation (most but not all).  They still
get an office paid for, security paid for, office staff paid for plus now
they get FOUR HUNDRED THOUSAND A YEAR!!!!!!  Oops, I forgot the yearly
$50,000 expense account.

Now on to PART II:  Alrighty, I am sending a "don't read this after eating"
warning <g>

Now, I want you to picture each of these people in your mind as I ask you
the question.  Keep picturing them as you scroll down to the answer:

What do Dumbya, Ronnie Baby Reagan and Trent Lot have in common (I mean
besides being crocked politicians <g>)?
 
 

And don't forget Dubya saying that there is no way the US is going to cut emssions of green-house gases (despite election pledges). His administration is busy trying to find a way to back out of anything the Clinton admin might have agreed to.
Makes you wanna scream.

Shyrley

Lynda
